title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed and pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoint).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, prompts library and REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama (Spring-friendly) with sync/async APIs and POJO model mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem exposing Ollama REST endpoints with idiomatic Ruby objects and streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, benchmarking and extending Ollama (Kubernetes, GPU, etc.).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Weaviate, Postgres and more for local RAG.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: One-file Streamlit chat app that connects to Ollama and supports file upload RAG via sentence-transformers.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: GitHub pull-request discussion on importing GPT4All model bundles into Ollama format.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate on crates.io providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama with dependency injection helpers and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CI/CD) Python module that spins up Ollama service in pipelines for model testing.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Vue3 + Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference RAG setup using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval.
